import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { WeatherService } from './services/weather.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private weatherService: WeatherService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.weatherService.getWeatherData('Wellington') .subscribe({ next: (response) => { console.log(response); } }) } }
